en.script:
[OUTRO SEGMENT - 6 seconds]

VISUAL: 
- Channel logo appears center-screen (25% width)
- Dark background (#1a1a1a)
- Smooth fade_in animation

AUDIO & TEXT:
"Thank you for watching!"

[PAUSE 1 second]

"Like, Share & Subscribe for more inspirational content"

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
- Subscribe button animation (YouTube red)
- Like and Share icons with gentle pulse effect
- Channel name: "Guidora Mindfulness"

[END OUTRO]

instadoodle_instructions.scene_description:
Create a professional outro scene with:

BACKGROUND:
- Solid dark background (#1a1a1a)
- Clean, minimalist design

MAIN ELEMENTS:
1. Channel logo (centered, prominent)
2. Text: "Thank you for watching!" (appears first)
3. Text: "Like, Share & Subscribe for more inspirational content" (appears after 1 second)
4. Subscribe button visual (YouTube red color)
5. Like and Share icons

ANIMATION:
- Logo fades in smoothly
- Text appears with gentle slide-up effect
- Subscribe button has subtle pulse animation
- Professional, clean transitions

BRANDING:
- Channel name: "Guidora Mindfulness"
- Consistent with YouTube branding standards
- Encourages engagement without being pushy
instadoodle_instructions.voice_script: "Thank you for watching!" [pause] "Like, Share & Subscribe for more inspirational content"
